text: Kopsia tenuis is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is a tree endemic to the Sarawak region of Malaysia, on the island of Borneo.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesWorld Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Kopsia tenuis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
